short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select any word, then left click on the word with Shift key pressed (Left Key + Shift)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A great and easy way to search meaning of word on dictionary. Just select the word, then press shift key and then left click from mouse, easy, isn't it? Enjoy and please feel free to give your valuable feedback. Thank you.
